title.narrative: Electricity Supply Accountability and Reliability Improvement Project

description.narrative: The proposed development objective is to improve the reliability of electricity supply in the project area and strengthen the governance of Severelectro's operations.

target.value: Financial Statements are in accordance with IFRS and audited by independent private auditor acceptable to the Bank

actual.value: Alignment of accounting policies with IFRS is ongoing and staff is in training. Consultant hired to prepare SE for IAS-based entityaudit. The selection of a separate consulting firm for auditing the FY18-19 financial statements is at the final stage.

title.narrative: Transparency and fairness in procurement improved

target.value: Tenders through e-Government Procurement issued, and 100% of invitation for bid and contract award results (following competitivetenders) are published on SE's website

actual.value: End target has been achieved. Assessment of the current public procurement framework in Kyrgyz Republic and preparation of standardbidding documents for design, supply and installation of plant and equipment completed. Ministry of Finance approved the StandardBidding Documents (SBD) through "Order 141-p" in October 2017. Training of procurement staff in SE and MoF on the use of the newbidding documents has been completed.All national procurement is conducted through e-Government platform, as well as all tendersand contract awards are published on Secerelectro's website.

target.value: MISs in use as evidenced by 95% of: (i) customers metered and billed using CMS; (ii) commercial complaints attended using CMS; and(iii) complaints for outages using IRMS

actual.value: Outage Management System (OMS) is fully operational, and in use through four distribution Operation Centers, which is helping tospeed-up the restoration of service due to equipment failures. ERP has been upgraded by SE own resources, GIS is at the biddinglaunch stage.

title.narrative: Reliable operational and financial data available to the management of SE and key external stakeholders

target.value: Data generated through MISs available to SE management, regulatory authority and Government; selected data available to customers

actual.value: Some data generated through MISs (Commercial Management System, Outage Management System) is available to SE.
